title: business-intelligence
text:
what?

A server-side web API consists of one or more publicly exposed endpoints to a defined request–response message system, typically expressed in JSON or XML.
– Wikipedia

business-intelligence
text:
API docs

OpenAPI docs let you interact with an API from the web

httpbin
FastAPI and Plumber generate these from your code

Flask supports these through additional packages

title: business-intelligence
text:
exercise 1

build the exercise environment in your preferred language
go to the “vanilla” folder
launch the API and explore its behavior from the docs


RPython


renv::restore()


python -m venv .venv
source .venv/bin/activate
python -m pip install -U pip setuptools wheel
python -m pip install -r requirements.txt

title: business-intelligence
text:
testing from the command line

curl: universally available, powerful, a bit onerous when data is involved
httpie: simple syntax, great for quick testing, written in Python

using httpie, test calling the API in your development environment

use the shorthand syntax for localhost
